DOC.brief_title: Safety and Antiviral Activity of IDX184 in Combination With Pegylated Interferon and Ribavirin for 12 Weeks (MK-2355-005)
DOC.criteria: Males and females with documented genotype 1, chronic hepatitis C infection. Must agree to use doublebarrier method of birth control for at least 6 months after the last dose of study drugs. Has not received prior antiviral treatment for HCV. Written informed consent by participant. Pregnant or breastfeeding. Coinfected with hepatitis B virus (HBV; hepatitis B surface antigen [HBsAg] positive) and/or human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).
